title: Did Oprah Winfrey throw Tommy Hilfiger off her show to make a racist comment?
subtitle: It's supposed that Oprah Winfrey kicked Tommy Helfiger out of her gallery when he announced, "If I knew black and Asian would wear my clothes, I would never have designed them."
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: The designer Tommy Helfiger said black and Asian shouldn't be dressed.
